long_description: The Petzl Sakapoche Chalk Bag includes a small zippered pocket for storing keys, money and a granola bar while you're climbing, and the ergonomic shape makes it easy to access the chalk. Cordlock closure system can be opened with only 1 hand should you forget to open the chalk bag before you start climbing. Reinforced rim maintains the shape of the bag. Elastic loop holds a brush (not included) for cleaning off holds. Wide, round shape allows for easy access to the chalk; supple fabric is comfortable to wear with a backpack on or when your back is against a rock wall. Microfleece interior liner resists matting and ensures good transfer of chalk to your hands; soft liner flap helps prevent accidentally losing chalk. The Petzl Sakapoche Chalk Bag comes with an adjustable webbing belt.
